content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: TXSEQ
      operator: is_not_unique_set
      value: DOMAIN
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.231
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: TXSEQ should be unique for each record within the TX dataset.
Outcome:
  Message: TXSEQ is not unique in TX
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '231'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Unique number for this record within this dataset.
                  (This sequence should be unique within the entire dataset because
                  there is no USUBJID.)
                Document: IG v3.1
                Item: Specification
                Section: 7.4.1
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - TRIAL DESIGN
  Domains:
    Include:
      - TX

json.Description: TXSEQ should be unique for each record within the TX dataset.

Outcome.Message: TXSEQ is not unique in TX

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Unique number for this record within this dataset. (This sequence should be unique within the entire dataset because there is no USUBJID.)
